channel.title: RuneZilla | Fun begins here - minigames! All skills! - and more!
channel.description:
[center]Information: Website: http://runezilla.com Webclient: http://runezilla.com/play Client Download: http://runezilla.com/forum/runezillav1.jar Forums: http://runezilla.com/forum
Why RuneZilla? Here on RuneZilla, we listen to our players. If you make a suggestion, it will be recognized! Staff positions here are not given out freely, they are earned. We will have outstanding staff along with a perfect economy. There is over 10 boss' ,15 Minigames in which 5+ are custom and over 500+ new RuneScape items!
How to play? You can: 1. Download the client and play by clicking the link above! 2. Click the Webclient link above and begin playing! 3.Click the forum link and then go from there!
Features: Daily updates! VPS! Dicing! 10+ Bosses 15+ minigames! All skills have been perfected with very few exceptions. Perfect Player vs. Player! Donator Zone/Donator only features! Lots More![/center]
[center][img]http://img535.imageshack.us/img535/7088/aqdadf.png[/img][/center] [center][img]http://img546.imageshack.us/img546/7766/36628306.png[/img][/center] [center][img]http://img266.imageshack.us/img266/2264/owoowet.png[/img][/center]
[center]Credits: Xyle (Home page website template) Tony (All website coding and features)[/center]

item.description:
@vZore wrote:

[center]Information:
Website: http://runezilla.com
Webclient: http://runezilla.com/play
Client Download: http://runezilla.com/forum/runezillav1.jar
Forums: http://runezilla.com/forum

Why RuneZilla?
Here on RuneZilla, we listen to our players. If you make a suggestion, it will be recognized! Staff positions here are not given out freely, they are earned. We will have outstanding staff along with a perfect economy. There is over 10 boss’ ,15 Minigames in which 5+ are custom and over 500+ new RuneScape items!

How to play?
You can:

  1. Download the client and play by clicking the link above!
  2. Click the Webclient link above and begin playing!
    3.Click the forum link and then go from there!

Features:
Daily updates!
VPS!
Dicing!
10+ Bosses
15+ minigames!
All skills have been perfected with very few exceptions.
Perfect Player vs. Player!
Donator Zone/Donator only features!
Lots More![/center]

[center][/center]
[center][/center]
